\chapter{Air-mail} 

\ph[width=.80\textwidth]{../sharjah/uk-sharjah-first-air-mail.jpg}{2716	1932. SHARJAH. 1st Arabian Airmail. Air mail cover sent from UK to Sharjah bearing 6 pence. Pre-printed envelope for the occasion of flying to India via the Arabian coast. No further markings.				60.00}
